id.description: The unique identifier for this one-time recharge entry.

address_id.description: The unique identifier for the address associated with this one-time recharge data.

created_at.description: The date and time when this one-time recharge was created.

customer_id.description: The unique identifier of the customer who made this one-time recharge.

next_charge_scheduled_at.description: The date and time when the next charge is scheduled for this one-time recharge.

price.description: The price of the product for this one-time recharge.

product_title.description: The title of the product associated with this one-time recharge.

properties.description: Additional properties or details related to this one-time recharge entry.

quantity.description: The quantity of the product for this one-time recharge.

recharge_product_id.description: The unique identifier of the product for this one-time recharge (recharge-specific ID).

shopify_product_id.description: The unique identifier of the product on Shopify.

shopify_variant_id.description: The unique identifier of the variant on Shopify.

sku.description: The Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) of the product associated with this one-time recharge.

status.description: The current status of this one-time recharge entry.

updated_at.description: The date and time when this one-time recharge entry was last updated.

variant_title.description: The title of the variant associated with this one-time recharge.
